storyInfo: The Grand Tutor makes his appearance. He reveals the true nature of the entire incidentâ€”a great examination, a game and contest. Each side submitted their own answers, and what they now face is the ice-cold corner of an even greater scheme.

attributes.content: What of Rhodes Island's plans after this?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Uh... er... huh? Did I ever introduce myself?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What of your plans, even?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I've been planning to get this all behind me, go back and ask that aloof Mr. Liang... to pay my bills well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Perhaps he was right. You and we are not solely together brought for this.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Only...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Leizi, how'd you...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I happened to learn from fellow disciples about the Mount Hui-ch'i business, and immediately rushed for Shangshu.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: I might've been a little late, but not too late after all.
attributes.name: Leizi

attributes.content: That's good, then.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Miss Ling.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I have a question.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How do beings like you determine... er, who's older and younger?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ah, establishing the pecking order.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Within a sea of chaos, whoever first finds that answer, first exists upon the human realm.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What answer's that?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: One to a question incredibly simple...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: ...'Who am I.'
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Mr. Taihe, Mr. Zuo Le. It's good to meet you.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Miss Ning. Good to meet you.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Assistant Minister Ning, my pleasure.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: 'Tis unbecoming of my etiquette that I could not offer you hospitality for your time in Shangshu.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: We came uninvited and troubled you greatly. We should be first to apologize.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You came on your father's orders, handling the goblet and Mount Hui-ch'i incidents in the Sui Regulator's name. 'Twas swift, fierce action.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Your insight is as a beacon, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But Mr. Liang's actions, breaking past settled positions, were all the more admirable.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Were it not for the Sui Regulator's radicality, he may not have needed such drastic action.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: My conscience is clear. I imagine the Department of Discipline and Supervision will pursue their own amends once they learn of this.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I've drawn up my report to the Emperor. It's open and fair. No bias allowed for.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: As you say, Mr. Taihe, 'garner loyalty and forsake righteousness.'
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But the Sui Regulator has overstepped its ambit. No matter the Grand Tutor's determining, I will report the reality to the High Minister.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: As one should.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No need.
Zuo Le.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Here... here!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: By your inference and in those circumstances, how long would you need to suppress the situation, should the three's Sui-Xiang roam the human realm to harm Shangshu?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: And should the bestial Sui have awakened, and Yan readied a city to fight it, what would the price be?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The former would require three days' effort. The latter would be mutual loss, with the feranmut dead, and three-tenths of the army gone.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Liang Xun.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If I sentenced you to death today, to protect the Ministry of Rites and Sui Regulator, what would you do?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Submit to the law, as I ought.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Then if by unexpected turns, your actions today led Shangshu City to be damaged and the common people harmed, what would you do?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Should I have sought a way for survival, then better late than never.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The game until now was of equal occupation.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The Lungmenite you chose was an unusual, irrational move, yet he seized some hint from it. A suboptimal piece.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Given so, how much more is within his reckoning? And how much that he hasn't accounted for will return to benefit him?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You perceive this matter finely, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Liang Xun. The one to take your place as magistrate will arrive at Shangshu within a month. Prepare the transition, and leave with me.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I... do not know what you mean, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Follow me to the capital.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: My thanks, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But I still...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: â€”I, Ning Ciqiu, congratulate Mr. Liang on his promotion.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Assistant Minister Ning.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yumen's route back to Yan is set. It docked with Lungmen yesterday, to ready and resupply.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Was... Yumen City avoiding Catastrophe? Or...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It had other purpose.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Leave for Yumen ahead of time. When I and Liang Xun finish business in the capital, we will naturally proceed for it too.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Right...! Understood.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Taihe.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: All is proceeding smoothly.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Uncle Taihe? So you long since...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: 'Garner loyalty and forsake righteousness.' Blame me not, young man.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: We will withhold investigation into the Sui Regulator's lapse here for now. At present, only determining whither the one hundred and eighty-one black stones are is key.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Grand Tutor, when will you leave Shangshu?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Tomorrow eve.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: So very pressing. Need we not await the Messenger ranks' escort...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Unnecessary.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Tianshi Bai will want to send you off.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Unnecessary still.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Shangshu's mountain ways are rugged. I fear it may be dangerous if you are alone...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What, as if wily criminals dare run amok within Shangshu's borders?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: No. I simply mind your advanced years. Be careful on lone outings, please...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Within Great Yan's domain under heaven, I only fear if the common people go without peace and national trade is not sufficiently prosperous.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: What else should I fear?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Is anything else worth my fear at all?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: That's over with.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Past the fire of danger.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You certainly didn't feel the heat.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But the danger weighed on us all.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So it was all your secret orders from the Sui Regulator, having me bring the cup from Lungmen back to Shangshu.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But your status stood in the way, and so did a certain someone by your side, so you had to put a thief's cap on me and get the escorts to act their show.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: â€”But you never coordinated that act with me, which I think shows you never wanted to put it on in the first place.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You know I never liked acting.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So was this your own idea?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But the Candleholders were in Shangshu, and they wouldn't give up at the drop of a hat.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You never even wanted this to go down in Shangshu, let alone the Sui Regulator usurping you for a while, them and the Ministry of Rites tearing into each other.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But if you had your way there, you'd be cast on injustice's side.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And so there was someone who probably loved nosing, and probably felt very sorry for you, and he sent a bounty hunter to come steal the cup.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Since then it's a weight off your hands.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You know who that someone is.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Maybe I do.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But nobody foresaw Shang Zhong would come soaring through the sky, out for a life.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Things turned for the worse, and off everyone tumbled to Qujiang Peak and the Field of Forgotten Water. Not very smart work from you, no, not smart at all...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But for you, for Liang Xun, maybe it was a little too smart at the same time.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Which is why I entrusted you with it.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Someone who could both tell what I was thinking, and would never betray his friends.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Should I thank you for still considering me a friend?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When all's said and done, though, I wasn't out to find who that goblet's owner was.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What were you looking for?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're still that same old you, filled with ambition as ever, aren't you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You've gotten smarter, Liang Xun.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: But that's just fine. Carry on, you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I have a rough idea as to Huai Tianpei's whereabouts.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You've had a rough idea for ages. You just didn't want me distracted.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you upset at me for not telling you?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I was more worried I'd need to keep assisting you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's been a rumor going about the world of Yanese kung fu lately.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Ah, the martial world's rumors.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When there's kung fu involved, he could hardly be left out of things.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hmm. Shangshu's a fine place.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The plum blossoms bloomed late this year, and I wondered why; so your private visit to this city it was. A rare, rare guest.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: When did you master this place?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: If wished you did to look into it deeply, I could be considered half of these mountains' master true.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The point in question isn't in the persons. It's in you, and your collective.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: When the day comes, what sides you stand on, what ways you see things, which ways your hearts feel, will all determine what is lost in the battle there and then.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Yan is a hard foe to defeat.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You do have the right to speak on behalf of Yan's army.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You and that learned master held the north for a hundred years apiece, it must be recognized. If not for that, the court would hardly remember you so fondly.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator's deeds may be sensed to encroach, but no matter what, you are fondly cherished.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The years and months tower tall, joys parted with so reluctantly.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: To this day, in my deepest drunken depths, still my ears prick at horns sounding battalions forth.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: ...Nian.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The court wants to make a deal with you.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Well how about that. I thought I'd be getting my execution date.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Chamber of Heaven's Designs hasn't ceased once in a whole millennium. Countless troops and tianshi lie buried in action in the north, yet evil rises as virtue does. The slaughter of wicked spirits is endless, and we've not been able to close the book on it.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The finest of soldiers, the grandest of marshals, the wisest of tianshi, all rush to man the frigid north, year upon year upon year.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The court wants you to erect twelve pagodas and five cities outside the Chamber of Heaven's Designs. Three thousand mechanisms, millions of terracottas.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You needn't do it immediately. Nor will you be on your own. Yan has begun sorting it out, drafting blueprints, and assigning every great tianshi to the case.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I hope you will lend a hand. It'll allow someone to make a return from that tower, at least.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: One who would never fall, but absolutely must never fall.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You're kidding. I heard some of the rumors from Leizi. Her founder was a super-annoying guy... even if she never met him.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hmph... a special case of a long life warped by dependence on Originium. Such humankind really doesn't agree with me...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Isn't this just because he gave you all that hassle?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Ah... I remember him.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Is he still well?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: He is.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: He's been stationed at the north for over three hundred and seventy years now. If he can return home, the court would be willing to let him rest at ease, allow him a peaceful retirement...
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: But the man always says he'd hate to be idle.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Sounds like some major engineering work. What do I get out of it, then?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The court will help you with what you want to do.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The wild bestial of bloodshot eyes can't be caged forever.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Hah. It all sounds like a win-win for you. We Yan people sure love to haggle...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's all on that. Think about it.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I have a matter I'd like to ask of you in turn.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Please, go on.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: As of now, is he...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: His actions surpassed all feranmutologists' predictions. Turning his own flesh into one hundred and eighty-one black stones... scattering them in the human realm... hmm.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: He wants to set up a game across the entire land.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: In his endgame days, he'll surely appear again. You'd best ask him yourself then.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: It's a game we must win.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We cannot lose.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Did you hear that, you two?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Would he lose to this Grand Tutor, playing on nineteen by nineteen?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Of course he wouldn't.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Then how did the Grand Tutor beat him?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor did not play go with him.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Black and white in their millions upon nineteen by nineteenâ€”it has its intrigue, true, but the Grand Tutor speaks that absorbed within a board of pieces, he cannot see man.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Man?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Thus the Grand Tutor played a different game with him. With Yan's domain as the board, with the land's every commoner as the pieces.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Who won?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor, at that time. Thus he was willingly bound in captivity by Yan, and with every loss, he would stay prisoner sixty years.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Heh. If Yan always had a genius to beat him, he'd never get a foot out of the capital his whole life, huh?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who can profess to know? He's very poor at the chesses, truth be told.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Very slow to learn them, too. Centuries ago, in one cycle of sixty years, he lost hundreds upon thousands of games. The following cycle, he lost some less, and after one more, no more than a hundred games, give or take.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: And so forth, until a point when no one was left who could beat him.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Thus on that cycle, he left the capital... and so that incident transpired.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: That's when our third sis...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We could all sense that this was no pleasant matter.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: So the Grand Tutor had to kick his ass before he dragged his own tail back to the capital, ready to be punished?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Perhaps it was a good, long while since last he lost in one fell swoop.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Or it may be... that his sights were not set on Yan alone anymore.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: So you're Ning Ciqiu.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: And you, the bounty hunter of enough bravery to plunder a Tianshi Bureau procession.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I-I didn't know they were good guys yet...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Where's that old man anyway? The Bai guy?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I will take you to meet him.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I think, in this turn of events, thanks are due for you.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It's alright.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But I still don't get the full picture. Wasn't it just a goblet? If you knew where it was, couldn't you go sneak it off yourself and be done with it?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: He would not want to hand it to me, so I could hardly take it.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: So you got me to help? Why?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Why, I wonder.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I simply did not want him drawn into so many vexing matters, without the slightest self-awareness.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: So this bounty hunter really was yours, Assistant Minister Ning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You need not raise your hackles. They are not enemies.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Only...
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: It was the Sui Regulator who hastened in its conduct; we won't question her deeply. Er... as long as she entered Yan's borders through legitimate means, of course...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Go and meet with Tianshi Bai, Blacknight. He awaits you at the agreed location.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Alright. You take care.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You'd seen through both the Sui Regulator and Mr. Liang's schemes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Not too long ago.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: But you seem to not have seen through Mr. Liang's plans to mediate from within.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: He may simply have been apprehensive about betraying you, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Regardless, the Sui Regulator overstepped their bounds in this. We will later address the matter ourselves with the Ministry of Rites.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It is no matter. 'Tis all to plan further for Yan.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: 'Tis cold outside; may you all rest soon. I will go see young Blacknight; 'tis her first time in Yan, and I cannot rest easy.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Farewell, Miss Ning.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Be safe.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I can only hope this pair in love... aren't shaken by big things to come.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're young, Lord Zuo. To say such things invites ideas of feigned maturity.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: As a Candleholder, I've none of my own ties of the sort.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If I may boldly mention, when you previously passed through that village and dealt with bandits, you did haveâ€”
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough*â€”I trust that girl was only repaying the favor! How can you muddle this with affairs between the sexes?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It was a life saved. If the intent was impure, that would only further serve doubts of advantage being taken.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You presume wrong, Uncle Taihe.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: It is as you say, young man.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Not heading back to Lungmen, Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: No. There's still someone I need to find.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Come with?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm stopping by the branch office with the funnyman anyhow, and then I've got to get back to the Rhodes Island landship...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It seems we'll be tagging along. But I'd rather not be a nuisance to Rhodes Island again.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No need to stand on honor.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Trust me, it's personal matters.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That codename Nothing operator got drawn into all this mess, had his leg hurt for nothing, and he's still in the hospital now. Don't want to give you all any more grief than that.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's good, then.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: K-Kroos!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, fancy that! Mulberry!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If you're in Shangshu already, I'm guessing Lava got to the branch office a while ago, then?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Y-Yeah... and Lava wanted me to tell you too, it's best you head there quickly. It seems like something else happened...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Ahaha... this trip to Yan sure never takes a breather.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It happens.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It used to just be around Lungmen and stuff... oh, right.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I've been wanting to ask. You said Mr. Liang and Wei Yenwu are real alike, but alike how?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Did I say that?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You did. After we met him, I was even thinking, wait, they're completely different...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Well, after all... both their sweethearts have them by the ears.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're back.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: A hundred and eighty-one black stones. You'll beat Sui to losing your sanity.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: While you've already spent all these years in here, in your drunken stupor? No... the years and months mean nothing to you.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: That farce of the Xingyu Escort Association was a move planned out by you.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Not totally.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: They should be clean of responsibility for me... Why swallow them all into this?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Just as a reminder.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: A reminder to me?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Here you dream of all under heaven. Though you know how the universe dwarfs all, the grass in spring still tugs at your heart.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: From Jiangnan, up to Saibei, then back to this summit atop the clouds, you've changed a lot. It disturbs me, little sister, so I warn you.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: Warn you that the feelings of man are not so pure as those moralists would have you believe.
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: Sat on equally pitted sides, the brother is in strife, love and disgust and passion and resentment all taken as pieces to the game.
You don't fear them now. Of course you don't. But sooner or later, you will. Nian will, Dusk will. They've become too much like people, so they will come to fear those things.
That is all... this little warning is.
Are you angered?
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: The cup should only hold wine; wine should not be so wordy.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: In that instant, all things halt.
Shangshu's Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks now have one more peak, and countless more trees, with countless more branches, with countless more leaves.
Wind blows, but the leaves are still.
Shangshu once had a Catastrophe.
The devastating storm loose with sparks, shattered Originium crystals descending like fiery rain.
â€”Shangshuâ€”once had a Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: Someoneâ€”offered wine to the heavens, and the black clouds parted, and the people were safe! And yet now, you're going to fling this goblet to the black clouds!
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: A black goblet. A black piece.
In the face of the most terrifying disaster of all the land, all trace is instantly annihilated.
Are you feeling wrathful? Compassionate? Envious?
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: Carve these emotions into youâ€”things are soon to comeâ€”
attributes.name: Voice in the Cup

attributes.content: Things, soon to come... Certainly, I cannot stay uninvolved... isn't that right.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Phew... haah.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: For now, I shall go purchase wine.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I'll be leaving Shangshu.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If two people want to kill each other, the feelings aren't too hard to understand.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But if two people want to be killed by the other...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Then we should save the effort. We'd just be wallowing.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'm planning to retire now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Du Yaoye still isn't ready for it. And doesn't the girl seem just a little like she wants her own business?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: If so, I'll shutter things.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Don't you agree?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm not one of the escorts.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue. Our business is only postponed for a while. We're not shaking hands and making up here.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Association custom says you don't talk grudges when you're at the bar. I'll be in Shangshu anyhow, waiting for you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: One last thing.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I hear...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Dad! Master Shang!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What are you charging in here about...?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I've decided! Me and the guys all talked it through!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: We're going to Yumen!
attributes.name: Miss Du
